message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's in great condition and would be a valuable asset to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you!
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price.  I'm willing to come down to $9,250.  Let's see if we can find a happy medium.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I can offer $9,000 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.
